description.value: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual parcitipates in an encounter

definition.value: The practitioner responsible for admitting a patient to a hospital or other inpatient health facility
The practitioner responsible for discharging the patient from a hospital or other inpatient health facility
The practitioner responsible for overseeing a patient's care during the encounter
An advisor participating in the service by performing evaluations and making recommendations
The practitioner that referred the patient to another practitioner
A translator who is facilitating communication with the patient during the encounter
A person to be contacted in case of an emergency during the encounter
A person to be contacted when the patient is discharged
